::Diamond::

She looked at her wrists.  She still had her old cuffs on.
She walked over to the wall and leaned against it. She folded her 
arms to cover her wrists. "Well, the cuffs would not only control the 
bot, but relay all actions that the bot did to the council. It 
constantly monitored the bot's movements as well as it's thoughts.  
The one who had the main controlling computer could control the the 
bot totally. The bot's mind, actions,feelings, everything." She 
looked down and sighed.  "Those things aren't what I would call a 
good thing. They can do strange things to a bots mind if left to 
control the bot to long." 


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> GTG. Be back in 2 hours.
> 
> ::DevilDuer::
> 
> DevilDuer looks oveer at Diamond, nodding. "Hmm... Yeah, they tried 
> using a mind control device on me once, interesting consecuences."
> 
> He puts the necklace into the machine. "What'd that wrist cuff do?"
>
